Getting a monster's stats over 999?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS 2: Misc. QA (post all new topics here, well make more sections later) : Getting a monster's stats over 999?
By Teh Pienator on Saturday, March 14, 2009 - 10:28 pm:

Right, so I have a Mew/Abyss which I made with the stone I got from the Mew Battle Royale.

I used cheats to get the stats to 999, then
remove them and train the rest, but for some reason, the bar isn't full yet, but the stats aren't going over 999. It's still a baby btw.

Does anyone know what the problem is?

By Thorr on Sunday, March 15, 2009 - 05:51 pm:

Even if you can go over 999, you still can't have a total > 5996. If you want a stat higher than 999, you need another stat to be lower.
